short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for Tab awareness and organisation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taboholic helps you taboholics manage your tabs. Providing them in a list view, ready to be closed or opened from the Chrome Extension. Whilst your there, you can view the emissions per tab that are accumulated per visit, as a reminder to close the tabs in the background.
